{"blocks":[{"key":"6669n","text":"Discard coating reagents and add   per well of NB/B27 complete medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7qss7","text":"Keep the plate at   for   before seeding cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"97D60D90E49111EE9B730A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"97D60E26E49111EE9B730A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","duration":900,"error":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"97D60EB3E49111EE9B730A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fjp64","text":"Replate cultured iPSC-derived dopaminergic neurons (day 30, see Method section of paper) on one side of the two-chamber microfluidic compartmentalization device (OMEGA4, eNuvio) at a cell concentration of 3×105. Only the axons of DA neurons can migrate through the microfluidic channels connected to the adjacent chamber. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":209,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3iehv","text":"Feed neurons with fresh NB/B27 media every 3 days. Add   Laminin to NB/B27 media every 10 days before feeding the neurons.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1s80u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1527}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8529r","text":"After an additional 25 days in the co-culture device, thaw frozen iPSC-derived medium spiny neurons (MSN) from BrainXell and plate on the other half of the device (where only the axons of DA neurons are present) at a cell concentration of 3x105 cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":243,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
